name: zetta-store-and-forward
description: Buffer device data going to the cloud until a peer is connected or reconnects. This module is an app that plugs into [Zetta](http://zettajs.org) By default this module stores events in an in memory FIFO that starts to overwrite it's self after 100,000 events. However this can be swapped out using the `db` option.
author: Adam Magaluk <AdamMagaluk@gmail.com>
